title: please update my board profile, I am not Level 1

replies.body: It can take a bit for your account to sync up to the boards and show your accurate level.  I did force a resync just in case, so you should be good to go!

thanks, hey any idea when we can expect a patch addressing some of the community concerns with Kayn? specifically his Rhaast form not healing, or ult damage underpower vs non-tank champions?(rhaast form)
